A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far the worst Star Wars movie ever made. It ruined Luke Skywalker's character\, and was just another remake of Empire Strikes Back\, just as Force Awakens was a remake of A New Hope. Cool fight scene\, if it wasn't with someone who was beaten by a girl who never picked up a lightsaber before in her life in the last movie. Did Kylo Ren suddenly remember how to fight? This movie totally ruined Star Wars for me. I've been a die hard fan ever since the original trilogy came out\, but I will stick to the first 6 movies. This new trilogy will not be in my collection.
